Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE

Title: Establishes a defense for underage sale of alcoholic beverages to licensees which perform transaction scans and have no violations for 2 years
Summary: Establishes a defense for underage sale of alcoholic beverages to licensees which perform transaction scans and have no violations for 2 years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to establishing a defense to administrative actions brought by the state liquor authority for providing alcoholic beverages to a person under twenty-one years of age
